Entity.Description: This table provides the information for each pricing rule.
Entity.Name: Pricing_Rule

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YPM_PRICING_RULE table.
Attribute.Name: Pricing_Rule_Key

Attribute.Description: Description of the rule.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: Name of the pricing rule.
Attribute.Name: Pricing_Rule_Name

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the rule is custom or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Custom_Rule

Attribute.Description: Indicates the status of the pricing rule.
Attribute.Name: Pricing_Status

Attribute.Description: Date from which the rule is active.
Attribute.Name: Start_Date_Active

Attribute.Description: After this date the rule is not active.
Attribute.Name: End_Date_Active

Attribute.Description: Currency in which this rule is applicable.
Attribute.Name: Currency

Attribute.Description: Indicates the type of the rule.
Attribute.Name: Rule_Type

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the rule is targeted on items or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Item_Rule

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether inclusion trigger category and attributes are associated or not.
Attribute.Name: Associate_Inclusion_Category_Attribute_For_Trigger

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether inclusion target category and attributes are associated or not.
Attribute.Name: Associate_Inclusion_Category_Attribute_For_Target

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether exclusion trigger category and attributes are associated or not.
Attribute.Name: Associate_Exclusion_Category_Attribute_For_Trigger

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether exclusion target category and attributes are associated or not.
Attribute.Name: Associate_Exclusion_Category_Attribute_For_Target

Attribute.Description: Indicates, Trigger Inclusions are copied to Target Inclusions. Default is N
Attribute.Name: Copy_Trigger_Inclusions_To_Target_Inclusions

Attribute.Description: Indicates, Trigger Exclusions are copied to Target Exclusions. Default is Y
Attribute.Name: Copy_Trigger_Exclusions_To_Target_Exclusions

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether this pricing rule is a manually applied adjustment rule or not. A manual pricing rule is suggested by the pricing service based on contents or total of the order, which then again should be specified with the amount of adjustment to be applied against the order.
Attribute.Name: Is_Manual_Rule

Attribute.Description: Indicates that this rule is not applicable on entire order or lines that have either manual adjustments or manual rule adjustments specified.
Attribute.Name: Ignore_Rule_On_Manual_Adjustment

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether to optimize on the number of shipments or not. Applicable only for shipping category of rules.
Attribute.Name: Minimize_Number_Of_Shipments

Attribute.Description: The carrier service that this rule applies on. Applicable only for shipping category of rules.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Service_Code

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether this rule is a coupon or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Coupon_Rule

Attribute.Description: Indicates how the trigger for the rule is evaluated. Applicable only for combination type of rule.
Attribute.Name: Item_Operator_Code

Attribute.Description: Indicates the category to which the rule belongs.
Attribute.Name: Rule_Category

Attribute.Description: Pricing organization to which the configuration belongs.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: Seller who maintains this pricing rule. Promotion is defined by the seller.
Attribute.Name: Seller_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: Indicates that this item targeted rule is defined on item attribute values. Applicable for all types of rules.
Attribute.Name: Is_Item_Attribute_Value_Rule

Attribute.Description: Indicates that this item targeted rule is defined on category values. Applicable for all type of rules.
Attribute.Name: Is_Category_Rule

Attribute.Description: Boolean indicating if the rule adjustments should be distributed to lines or not.
Attribute.Name: Distribute_Adjustment

Attribute.Description: If set indicates that the rule should not be fired if the line item's unit price is locked. The line item can be the target or the rule trigger. Applicable only for rules that are item targeted, like combination and item quantity rules.
Attribute.Name: Ignore_Rule_On_Price_Lock

Attribute.Description: The rule is applicable for this Payment Type.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Type

Attribute.Description: Exclusivity Type of the Pricing Rule
Attribute.Name: Exclusivity_Type

Attribute.Description: ExclusivityID is used to group set of Pricing Rules for mutual exclusivity. Exclusivity Type settings are applicable among Pricing Rules having same ExclusvityID
Attribute.Name: Exclusivity_Id

Attribute.Description: This attribute is used to prioritize Pricing Rule among a list of applicable pricing rules with same Exclusivity settings. Higher the value of this attribute, higher the priority of Pricing Rule, to be applied to an order/item.
Attribute.Name: Priority

Attribute.Description: Indicates if the pricing rule is a Non-Instant Discount pricing Rule
Attribute.Name: Is_Non_Instant_Discount_Rule

Attribute.Description: If set indicates that the rule is applicable for multiple target items.
Attribute.Name: Enable_Mix_N_Match_Items

Attribute.Description: Indicates quantity required to trigger rule, which all valid trigger items count towards.
Attribute.Name: Common_Trigger_Quantity

Attribute.Description: If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Sunday.
Attribute.Name: Is_Active_On_Sunday

Attribute.Description: If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Monday.
Attribute.Name: Is_Active_On_Monday

Attribute.Description: If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Tuesday.
Attribute.Name: Is_Active_On_Tuesday

Attribute.Description: If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Wednesday.
Attribute.Name: Is_Active_On_Wednesday

Attribute.Description: If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Thursday.
Attribute.Name: Is_Active_On_Thursday

Attribute.Description: If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Friday.
Attribute.Name: Is_Active_On_Friday

Attribute.Description: If set indicates that the rule is applicable on Saturday.
Attribute.Name: Is_Active_On_Saturday

Attribute.Description: If not void indicates that the rule is applicable from this time.
Attribute.Name: Start_Time

Attribute.Description: If not void indicates that the rule is applicable till this time.
Attribute.Name: End_Time

Attribute.Description: Indicates whether the rule is a free gift rule or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Free_Gift_Rule

Attribute.Description: When enabled adjustment will be distributed to both the target and the qualifiers for combination rules
Attribute.Name: Apply_Prorated_Adjustment

Attribute.Description: if 'N' and the adjustment the rule applies is greater that the target items unitprice, the adjustment will be changed to be the unit price. Default value is 'Y'
Attribute.Name: Allow_Adjustment_GreaterThan_UnitPrice

Attribute.Description: If 'Y' all target items that create a combination will be discounted
Attribute.Name: Discount_All_Combination_Items

Attribute.Description: If 'Y' the adjustment for the rule will be distributed across the target combinations
Attribute.Name: Distribute_Adjustment_Across_Combo

Attribute.Description: This attribute is used by SBC application. It is a free text field. This attribute is not used by any pricing api internally.
Attribute.Name: Pricing_Complexity

Attribute.Description: This option limits the number of times that a pricing rule or coupon can be used in total, by all customers
Attribute.Name: Overall_Redemption_Limit

Attribute.Description: This option limits the number of times that a pricing rule or coupon can be used by a single customer.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Redemtpion_Limit

Entity.Description: This table maintains the list of Order Attribute filter conditions for Price Lists. Each GroupId represents a set of co-requirements, or ANDed conditions for a price list to be applicable. Only one GroupId condition set needs to be satisfied for a price list to be applicable. A condition can be one of one of three types: text, numeric, or Boolean. For numeric conditions, the condition can either be an exact match, or greater than or equal to a value and less than another value.
Entity.Name: Pricelist_Order_Attr
